summary: An email chain from October 2019 regarding assistance for a Jeffrey Epstein victim, specifically seeking therapist referrals from recipients in their Area of Responsibility (AOR). The email shows coordination efforts within the New York Field Office to provide victim support.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the perpetrator whose victim requires assistance with therapist referrals.

events.title: Email coordination for victim assistance
events.description: An email exchange regarding providing therapist referrals to assist a Jeffrey Epstein victim.

keyFacts: The document is an email from October 3, 2019, showing ongoing victim assistance efforts related to the Jeffrey Epstein case.
It specifically requests help with therapist referrals for an Epstein victim within the recipients' Area of Responsibility (AOR).
The correspondence indicates coordination within the New York Field Office regarding victim support.
The sender is identified as a 'Specialist' from the New York Field Office, though their name is not provided in the excerpt.
